posts.author: pookiee68
posts.title: I Just Changed My Voter Registration - YOU Can Too - Democrat For 49 Years - NO MORE, NEVER AGAIN - DEMOCRATS ARE EVIL

posts.raw_content:
The property he ran up was for a home the university purchased not too long ago and is currently remodeling. You can run right up that dirt driveway from the road he would have crossed heading north from the building he shot from, climbed up that hill/driveway, and then if he was smart, he likely had his car parked right around there for a faster escape. We had helicopters and swat teams and even highway patrol crawling through our neighborhood all day yesterday. 

My kids are spooked. My parents live next door. Obviously we're not in any danger as the kid clearly had a specific target in mind and had no intention of sticking around, but still. Such a weird 24 hours. I still can't believe a guy I watched so often and loved so much died in that way so close to where we live. Thank God we have the death penalty in Utah. May they catch him quickly.
posts.author: weholdthesetruths
posts.title: The neighborhood the shooter ran into is my neighborhood. Our house is literally twelve houses up the street from where he most likely entered from the campus.
posts.content:

We had helicopters and swat teams and even highway patrol crawling through our neighborhood all day yesterday.

My kids are spooked. My parents live next door. Obviously we're not in any danger as the kid clearly had a specific target in mind and had no intention of sticking around, but still. Such a weird 24 hours. I still can't believe a guy I watched so often and loved so much died in that way so close to where we live. Thank God we have the death penalty in Utah. May they catch him quickly.
